name: Kuhau
description:
-- WARNING! -- 

This game contains jumpscares!

Find 10 keys and escape before it's too late. Beware, there is something lurking in the dark!

If it's too dark/bright, you can always adjust brightness in the options (ESC).

Controls:

  • WASD = move
  • Shift = run
  • Control = sneak
  • E = interact
  • F = toggle flashlight
  • ESC = options

-- Tips if you need them --

  • The monster can't see you, it can only hear and smell you, use that as your advantage
  • It can't hear you when you are sneaking
  • Run only when it's necessary
  • After you have collected all ten keys, run for the door!
